name: remote-lab-reservation-system
description: Backend and Frontend code for the Remote Lab Reservation System.

scripts.test: echo 'Running Python backend tests...' && python -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt && ./venv/bin/python -m pytest tests/test_backend.py
scripts.test:coverage: echo 'Running Python backend tests with coverage...' && python -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt coverage && ./venv/bin/python -m coverage run -m pytest tests/test_backend.py && ./venv/bin/python -m coverage report
scripts.build: echo 'No dedicated frontend build step needed for plain HTML/Tailwind. Frontend is self-contained.'
